alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Holt and southeastern Boyd Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 625 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Butte, or 11 miles southwest of Spencer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opportunity, Spencer Dam, Midway, Parshall Bridge State Wildlife Management Area, Scottville, Redbird State Wildlife Management Area, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Anncar. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 193 and 210. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
